content: perfect for warming up on a breezy spring day this crochet shawl features a relaxing pattern with a rhythmic 2-row repeat made in bernat sport ombre twist the pattern uses double_crochet stitches worked into chain spaces instead of traditional stitches allowing it to work up quickly finished with a delicate picot edging for a touch of elegance this beautifully marbled wrap is sure to become a seasonal favorite in your accessories drawer materials bernat® sport ombre twist™ 9 9 oz/280 g 1011 yds/924 m amethyst 50009 1 ball or 1011 yds/924 m measurements approx 34 86 5 cm deep x 81 205 5 cm wide
